A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the worst star wars movies ever made. I feel cheated out of my time and money\, not only does the movie fail at being a star wars movie but it cannot even stand on its own merits. Full of regressive left propaganda\, plot holes and poorly written script. Very few redeeming features. Disney is trying to kill the franchise and wont ever let go of the IP. Guess its EU for me
